```{r}
data(OrchardSprays)
head(OrchardSprays)
summary(OrchardSprays)
```

```{r}
boxplot(decrease ~ treatment, data = OrchardSprays,
        main = "Effectiveness of Orchard Sprays",
        xlab = "Treatment", ylab = "Decrease in insect count")
```

```{r}
# The boxplot shows that treatments E, F, G, and H led to much higher decreases in insect counts compared to A, B, and C. Treatment H in particular has the highest median effectiveness. Lower treatments (A and B) show very little reduction.
```
